Text: Cool, thx for uploading this sceneline. Too bad it was maybe the most disgusting game ever to take place in the NFL. There's really very little reason for anyone to ever watch this. The insanely absurd officiating alone makes it feel like the Bataan death march.

thanks for the football games, but where is the seahawks game?   I missed it (didn't want to wake up at 10am on sunday) and i havne't seen the score or who won. 

ya, i know, get a dvr, i suck.   

but if you can get the seahawk game i'd love you long time. (no homo, unless it gets me stuff)
